title: Maple syrup production in Canada 2008 to 2019
summary: In general Production in million gallons has rose over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2015 and 2016.
The highest Production in million gallons, of value 12.51 was reached at Year 2017
Minimum Production in million gallons about 7.27 was reached at Year 2010
min_summary: Overall Production in million gallons has increased over the Year.
